description: This Jack Daniel's Honey Smash is a refreshing cocktail that will help you cool down on a hot day. The sweetness of the honey and orange juice pairs nicely with the bourbon whiskey, which gives it a nice kick. This drink is perfect for happy hour or any time you want to relax after work!
